descriptionlist.description:
ATTENTION! WhatsApp version 2.20.100 or higher is supported.
iWhatsApp will allow you not to be distracted by trifles by answering WhatsApp. Keep doing what you love, iWhatsApp will take care of your messages. iWhatsApp will answer, according to a pre-prepared template, for each contact individually; or everyone is the same. iWhatsApp can also match the words and phrases of the received message with a template and respond with pre-prepared phrases just for this case.
Some functions: - Answering machine for messages. - Activator gestures to activate responses. - Module for activating responses in the control center. - Individual responses for each contact separately. - One, prepared answer for all contacts. - Add contacts to the blacklist so that they do not receive automatic replies. - Delay in sending automatic replies. - Comparison of words and phrases..
